about_the_game:
Wordatro! is a roguelite that is both simple and easy-to-get-into, designed by an independent developer. This unique single-player game tests your linguistic skills and strategy, offering you a pool of letters to create words. Each letter has a point value, and the length of the words you form affects a score multiplier, pushing you to optimize every move.

As you accumulate points and reach specific thresholds, you unlock a wide range of bonuses, as well as modifiers on the letters that add variety and depth to each game. Whether you're a word game enthusiast or a roguelite fan, Wordatro! offers a rich and captivating challenge.

The replayability of Wordatro! is exceptional due to the numerous strategies available to achieve victory. Each game presents new combinations of bonuses, encouraging you to explore different approaches to overcome the 10 levels. With an intuitive interface and easy-to-learn controls, Wordatro! is accessible to everyone, while offering a depth of gameplay that will captivate even the most experienced and strategic players.

Created with passion, Wordatro! is an immersive adventure that combines simplicity and strategy. Take on the challenge and test your wordcrafting skills! Can you conquer all 10 levels and claim victory in Wordatro! ?
